title: Delegated Regulation (EU) 2021/1704 of 14 July 20212, in so far as it relates to
heading: 1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Statistics (Monthly Services Inquiry)
text_raw:
1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Statistics (Monthly Services Inquiry) 

(No. 2) Order 2023. 

(2) This Order shall come into operation on 1 January 2024.
text_norm: 1 (1) order may cited statistic (monthly service inquiry) (no 2) order 2023 (2) order shall come operation 1 january 2024

title: Delegated Regulation (EU) 2021/1704 of 14 July 20212, in so far as it relates to
heading: 2. (1) In this Order -
text_raw:
2. (1) In this Order - 

“inquiry” means the Monthly Services Inquiry that is conducted by the Central 
Statistics Office for the purposes of obtaining information specified in the 
Schedule, including for the purposes of compliance with the Regulation in so 
far as it relates to Article 4 and paragraphs (1)(a) and (b) and (2)(i) of Article 6 
thereof; 

“Regulation” means Regulation (EU) 2019/2152 of the European Parliament 
and of the Council of 27 November 20191, as amended by Commission 
Delegated Regulation (EU) 2021/1704 of 14 July 20212; 

“relevant period” means the period beginning on 1 February 2024 and ending 
on 31 December 2028. 

(2) A word or expression that is used in this Order and also used in the 
Regulation has the same meaning in this Order as in the Regulation, other than 
where the context otherwise requires.
text_norm: 2 (1) order - inquiry mean monthly service inquiry conducted central statistic office purpose obtaining information specified schedule including purpose compliance regulation far relates article 4 paragraph (1)(a) (b) (2)(i) article 6 thereof regulation mean regulation (eu) 2019 2152 european parliament council 27 november 20191 amended commission delegated regulation (eu) 2021 1704 14 july 20212 relevant period mean period beginning 1 february 2024 ending 31 december 2028 (2) word expression used order also used regulation meaning order regulation context otherwise requires

title: Delegated Regulation (EU) 2021/1704 of 14 July 20212, in so far as it relates to
heading: 3. This Order applies to a person who, or an undertaking that, is classified
text_raw:
3. This Order applies to a person who, or an undertaking that, is classified 
for statistical purposes under division 45 or 46 or section H, I, J, K, L, M, N, P, 
Q, R or S of NACE Rev. 2 set out in Annex I to Regulation (EC) No. 
1893/2006 of the European Parliament and of the Council of 20 December 
20063, as amended by Regulation (EC) No. 295/2008 of the European 
Parliament and of the Council of 11 March 20084, Regulation (EU) No. 
70/2012 of the European Parliament and of the Council of 18 January 20125, 

1 OJ No. L 327, 17.12.2019, p. 1 
2 OJ No. L 339, 24.9.2021, p. 33 
3 OJ No. L 393, 30.12.2006, p. 1 
4 OJ No. L 97, 9.4.2008, p. 13 
5 OJ No. L 32, 3.2.2012, p. 1 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 1st December, 2023. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [580] 3 

and Regulation (EU) 2019/1243 of the European Parliament and of the Council 
of 20 June 20196.

title: Delegated Regulation (EU) 2021/1704 of 14 July 20212, in so far as it relates to
heading: 4. A requirement on persons to whom, or undertakings to which, this
text_raw:
4. A requirement on persons to whom, or undertakings to which, this 
Order applies to provide, for the purposes of the inquiry, information the 
general nature of which is specified in the Schedule, monthly in the relevant 
period in relation to the immediately preceding month, is hereby prescribed.
text_norm: 4 requirement person undertaking order applies provide purpose inquiry information general nature specified schedule monthly relevant period relation immediately preceding month hereby prescribed

title: Delegated Regulation (EU) 2021/1704 of 14 July 20212, in so far as it relates to
heading: Article 4.

title: Delegated Regulation (EU) 2021/1704 of 14 July 20212, in so far as it relates to
heading: Information, regarding the following, as it relates to the person or
text_raw:
1. 

Information, regarding the following, as it relates to the person or 
undertaking concerned, and specifying the month to which the information 
relates: 

(a) 

(b) 

the total value, excluding VAT, of turnover; 

the total value, excluding VAT, of turnover of sales via the 
internet.
text_norm: 1 information regarding following relates person undertaking concerned specifying month information relates (a) (b) total value excluding vat turnover total value excluding vat turnover sale via internet

title: Delegated Regulation (EU) 2021/1704 of 14 July 20212, in so far as it relates to
heading: Information on the time taken by the person or undertaking concerned
text_raw:
2. 

Information on the time taken by the person or undertaking concerned 
to complete the questionnaire, form or other record prepared by the Director 
General for the collection of the information referred to in paragraph 1. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

28 November, 2023. 

LEO VARADKAR, 

Taoiseach.
